data.name: SOK PRO Upgrade
data.detailed_description:
Special Offer

https://store.steampowered.com/app/2003220/


About the Game

SOK PRO Upgrade - A massive upgrade of the game to professional functionality. Online statistics, undo of a move, dark theme, windowed mode and much more!

Features:
✔️ Undo of a move in case of error;
✔️ Personal statistics & Steam Leaderboards;
✔️ Switch between full screen and windowed mode;
✔️ Convenient and quick selection of the required level;
✔️ Ability to change the language and other settings;
✔️ Screenshots are working correctly;
✔️ New background music (can be turned off);
✔️ Selectable background color:
▪ Dark theme;
▪ Classic, light theme;
▪ Gold, Lime and Diamond backgrounds.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel / AMD 2.0 Ghz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 620
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Required: Keyboard, Mouse.Required: Keyboard, Mouse. Supported: 2560x1440/1920x1080 fullscreen. Windowed: 1920x1080/1600x900/1366x768 / 1280x720/1024x576/854x480 / 640x360/432x240
